meanings.definition: An uncomfortable sensation on the skin that causes a desire to scratch.
meanings.sent1: The mosquito bite left a bothersome itch on my arm.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't resist scratching the itch on my back.
meanings.sent3: The itch on my nose made me look like I was constantly sniffing something funny.
meanings.sent4: The itch of curiosity to know what was inside the mysterious box grew stronger.
meanings.sent5: The relentless itch on my ankle made it hard to focus on anything else.

meanings.sent1: She had an itch to travel and explore new places.
meanings.sent2: The itch for adventure led him to sign up for the extreme sports competition.
meanings.sent3: His sudden itch for ice cream in the middle of winter amused his friends.
meanings.sent4: The itch for success burned within her like a fierce flame.
meanings.sent5: The insatiable itch for knowledge drove him to read every book in the library.
